languages.text: "Этот вопрос лучше задать маршалу — я получил назначение, и это все, что мне известно. Но подозреваю, что дело в моем опыте: сбор десятины с полудиких миров, где живого Арбитес видели три поколения назад, разумно поручить ветерану".

"You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."
languages.original_text: "Этот вопрос лучше задать маршалу — я получил назначение, и это все, что мне известно. Но подозреваю, что дело в моем опыте: сбор десятины с полудиких миров, где живого Арбитес видели три поколения назад, разумно поручить ветерану".

languages.text: 「その件は将帥に聞いてください。私は任務を言い渡されただけです。おそらく、私の経験が買われたのでしょう。蛮族じみた辺境の惑星から租税を徴収し、三世代ものあいだアービトレイターの姿すら見たことがない連中を相手にする仕事は、熟練の者に任せるのが一番ですから」
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: 「その件は将帥に聞いてください。私は任務を言い渡されただけです。おそらく、私の経験が買われたのでしょう。蛮族じみた辺境の惑星から租税を徴収し、三世代ものあいだアービトレイターの姿すら見たことがない連中を相手にする仕事は、熟練の者に任せるのが一番ですから」

languages.text: "Das solltet Ihr den Marschall fragen. Ich erhielt meinen Auftrag, und mehr weiß ich nicht. Ich nehme an, es hat etwas mit meiner Erfahrung zu tun: Den Zehnt auf wilden Welten einzutreiben, wo die Leute seit drei Generationen keinen lebenden Arbitrator gesehen haben, ist eine Aufgabe, die man besser einem Veteranen überträgt."
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: "Das solltet Ihr den Marschall fragen. Ich erhielt meinen Auftrag, und mehr weiß ich nicht. Ich nehme an, es hat etwas mit meiner Erfahrung zu tun: Den Zehnt auf wilden Welten einzutreiben, wo die Leute seit drei Generationen keinen lebenden Arbitrator gesehen haben, ist eine Aufgabe, die man besser einem Veteranen überträgt."

languages.text: « Vous devriez demander au maréchal. J'ai été déployé ici, je ne peux rien vous dire de plus. J'imagine que c'est lié à mon expérience. Nous parlons ici de la perception de la dîme dans des planètes à peine civilisées, où personne n'a rencontré d'arbitrator depuis au moins trois générations. Il est plus sage de confier la tâche à un vétéran. »
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez demander au maréchal. J'ai été déployé ici, je ne peux rien vous dire de plus. J'imagine que c'est lié à mon expérience. Nous parlons ici de la perception de la dîme dans des planètes à peine civilisées, où personne n'a rencontré d'arbitrator depuis au moins trois générations. Il est plus sage de confier la tâche à un vétéran. »

languages.text: «Pregúnteselo al mariscal. Yo solo sé que me han encomendado una misión. Supongo que se debe a mi experiencia: recaudar diezmos en mundos que rayan en la barbarie, donde la gente no ha visto un Arbitrator vivo en tres generaciones, es una labor propia de un veterano».
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: «Pregúnteselo al mariscal. Yo solo sé que me han encomendado una misión. Supongo que se debe a mi experiencia: recaudar diezmos en mundos que rayan en la barbarie, donde la gente no ha visto un Arbitrator vivo en tres generaciones, es una labor propia de un veterano».

languages.text: “这个问题你应该去问元帅本人。我是因为任务才来这里的，我也只知道这些。或许是因为我经验丰富吧，毕竟前往近乎野蛮的众多世界，去几代人都没见过法务官的地方征收什一税，这种任务只适合经验丰富的成员。”
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: “这个问题你应该去问元帅本人。我是因为任务才来这里的，我也只知道这些。或许是因为我经验丰富吧，毕竟前往近乎野蛮的众多世界，去几代人都没见过法务官的地方征收什一税，这种任务只适合经验丰富的成员。”

languages.text: "Bunu Miralay'a sormalısınız. Görevim gereği buradayım, bildiğim başka bir şey de yok. Tecrübemden kaynaklandığını düşünüyorum. İnsanların üç nesildir canlı bir Yargıcı görmediği ve vahşiliğin hat safhada hissedildiği dünyalardan aşar toplamak, yalnızca bir kıdemlinin üstlenmesi gereken bir görevdir."
languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu Miralay'a sormalısınız. Ben görevimi aldım ve buraya geldim, bildiğim başka bir şey de yok. Tecrübemden kaynaklandığını düşünüyorum. İnsanların üç nesildir canlı bir Yargıcı görmediği ve vahşiliğin hat safhada hissedildiği dünyalardan aşar toplamak, yalnızca bir kıdemlinin üstlenmesi gereken bir görevdir."

languages.original_text: "You should ask the Marshal. I got my assignment, and that is all I know. I assume it's due to my experience: collecting tithes from worlds bordering on savagery and where people haven't seen a living Arbitrator in three generations is a task best left to a veteran."
